TopicTitle: HELP? Stuck on loading screen 1.3.1 mods

Articles.Content: My game would get stuck on the loading screen with "Module manager" On ksp 1.3.1 but its fine any other version. I have module manager 3.07

First of all, this could take long depending on how many mods you have installed and your machine specs.

Second, you should take a look at the ksp log. We may help you with that if you share it with us. If there is an issue during the loads related with module manager it will sure be there!

Modded support questoin moved to the modded support subforum. 

And good luck with your issue.

6 hours ago, starflexthe2nd said:

My game would get stuck on the loading screen with "Module manager" On ksp 1.3.1 but its fine any other version. I have module manager 3.07

Well MM 3.0.7 is for KSP 1.4.x. Don't just assume that mods (especially plugins) are backwards compatible and actually get the versions of a mod that were made for the version of the game you want to use.

8 minutes ago, Harry Rhodan said:

Well MM 3.0.7 is for KSP 1.4.x. Don't just assume that mods (especially plugins) are backwards compatible and actually get the versions of a mod that were made for the version of the game you want to use.

I posted a similar answer in your other thread, but I'll link it again:

Also, you seem the demographic that CKAN was made for, I'd highly recommend getting that installed and setup, and let it manage all your mods for you.  It will (usually) keep everything nice and tidy and compatible. 

 

But also note, with most every mod, there are more assets to load, so it may take a while.  I get loading times between 10 and 20 minutes depending on the mood of my laptop.
